Add-on recommendations for Firefox users

December 9, 2016

This is a reading suggestion for a very interesting post from the Mozilla Context Graph blog. The blog post describes the new prototype of the Firefox add-on recommender system: https://medium.com/firefox-context-graph/add-on-recommendations-for-firefox-users-7774cc5a5117

It was also cross-posted to Alessio’s blog.
